ygData.subject: RE: buying a weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: For 1hs I prefer the Barbed Leather Whip, not sure what they normally go for though as I have a tendency to either give things away or sale for extremely cheap
ygData.messageBody:
For 1hs I prefer the Barbed Leather Whip, not sure what they normally go for
though as I have a tendency to either give things away or sale for extremely
cheap prices (Sold a Barbed whip yesterday for 20pp)..

If you are in the low 20's go get a Bib's, easy to do other than the long
camp (sometimes) and that way you won't have to spend any money...


Enjoy..

Thomas


-----Original Message-----
From: atrocity apocalypse [mailto:atrocity_apocalypse@...]
Sent: Sunday, October 03, 1999 4:30 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] buying a weapon


From: atrocity apocalypse <atrocity_apocalypse@...>

You don't say what level your at, so this may not be
the best advice, but...

Save your money and go on the Grobb Cleaver quest. If
you complete the quest you'll have a very nice 2h
weapon that hits magic creatures and boosts stats. If
you can get 2-3 friends to group with you and spend
some time out in the OOT you should be all set.

For 1h weapons, I like the mino axe.

Atrocity

--- phreddy@... wrote:
> i have 110 plat to buy both a 1h slash and a 2h
> slash weapon. what weapons do people recommend for
> between 40 and 70 plat?
